channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: Pedaling for a pint
item.description: Thanks to a mutual attraction, craft breweries are popping up along bike trails everywhere.

item.title: Excursion to Stillwater
item.description: This historic Minnesota river town is a favorite weekend getaway.

item.title: Halloween in Chicago
item.description: During the scary season, this spirited city pulls out all the stops.

item.title: Door County 101
item.description: Want to check out this popular peninsula? Here's everything you need to plan a visit.

item.title: Hiking Minnesota's North Shore
item.description: For most, a day hike is the preferred way to soak up the scenery.

item.title: Hiking in Duluth
item.description: The city sections of the Superior Hiking Trail are easy to reach and amazingly scenic.

item.title: Duluth 101
item.description: Here's everything you need to know about visiting this lively port town on Lake Superior.

item.title: Colors of the North Shore
item.description: In fall, crowds pursue the hues along the shore of Lake Superior.

item.title: Party in Milwaukee
item.description: Summer is one long festival in this easygoing city on Lake Michigan.

item.title: Best of fall
item.description: The chase is on as autumn colors coat the countryside.

item.title: Following the tall ships
item.description: Sloops and schooners still sail on Lake Michigan and Lake Superior.

item.title: Greatest hits of the Ice Age
item.description: In Wisconsin, the best walking trails are gifts from the glaciers.
